trans-unit.source: The functions in the Service Hosting Runtime Native Library return a generic success or failure status.
trans-unit.target: The functions in the Service Hosting Runtime Native Library return a generic success or failure status.

trans-unit.source: To test for success, use the <externalLink><linkText>SUCCEEDED</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms687197(VS.85).aspx</linkUri></externalLink> macro.
trans-unit.target: To test for success, use the <externalLink><linkText>SUCCEEDED</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms687197(VS.85).aspx</linkUri></externalLink> macro.

trans-unit.source: To test for failure, use the <externalLink><linkText>FAILED</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms693474(VS.85).aspx</linkUri></externalLink> macro.
trans-unit.target: To test for failure, use the <externalLink><linkText>FAILED</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms693474(VS.85).aspx</linkUri></externalLink> macro.

trans-unit.source: Some functions in the library return a string into a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Some functions in the library return a string into a buffer.

trans-unit.source: These functions require that you pass in the size of the buffer when calling the function.
trans-unit.target: These functions require that you pass in the size of the buffer when calling the function.

trans-unit.source: If the buffer size is too small, the function returns the constant ROLEMANAGER_E_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER and a parameter that indicates the required size for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: If the buffer size is too small, the function returns the constant ROLEMANAGER_E_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER and a parameter that indicates the required size for the buffer.

trans-unit.source: The functions that may return this constant include the <link xlink:href="19f99ad3-f616-45f9-8505-e57e0d68268e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">RoleEnvironmentGetConfigurationSettingValue Function</link>, <link xlink:href="6afe9111-5636-4620-a7c0-fe63bc54fffc" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">LocalResourceGetName Function</link>, and <link xlink:href="f2d60630-b46d-4e9d-aab1-fde70cb04bb5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">LocalResourceGetRootPath</link> functions.
trans-unit.target: The functions that may return this constant include the <link xlink:href="19f99ad3-f616-45f9-8505-e57e0d68268e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">RoleEnvironmentGetConfigurationSettingValue Function</link>, <link xlink:href="6afe9111-5636-4620-a7c0-fe63bc54fffc" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">LocalResourceGetName Function</link>, and <link xlink:href="f2d60630-b46d-4e9d-aab1-fde70cb04bb5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">LocalResourceGetRootPath</link> functions.

trans-unit.source: A function that returns ROLE_ENVIRONMENT_E_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER may be retried with a larger buffer.
trans-unit.target: A function that returns ROLE_ENVIRONMENT_E_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER may be retried with a larger buffer.

trans-unit.source: No other errors may be retried.
trans-unit.target: No other errors may be retried.
